solution_line_template: Since one week is {days_per_week} days. {total_days} days is {total_days}/{days_per_week}=<<{total_days}/{days_per_week}={total_weeks}>>{total_weeks} weeks.

Since the python eats {alligators_per_week} alligator per week, in {total_weeks} weeks it can eat {total_weeks}/{alligators_per_week}=<<{total_weeks}/{alligators_per_week}={max_alligators}>>{max_alligators} alligators.
